author: Darrell Etherington
title: Oura partners with UCSF to determine if its smart ring can hep detect COVID-19 early
description: Startups continue to find new ways to contribute to ongoing efforts to fight the global spread of COVID-19 during the current global coronavirus pandemic, and personal health hardware-maker Oura is no exception. The smart ring startup is working with the Univ…
